thread.title: Oil Fluctuates Ahead of Inventory Data

author: Christopher Alessi
title: Oil Fluctuates Ahead of Inventory Data

organizations.name: oil fluctuates ahead of inventory data oil

text:
Oil prices wavered between gains and losses on Tuesday ahead of an expected build in U.S. crude stockpiles.
Light, sweet crude for April delivery declined 12 cents, or 0.2%, to $63.79 a barrel on the New York Mercantile Exchange. Brent, the global benchmark, lost 6 cents, or 0.1%, to $67.44 a barrel.
